entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -21.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
